page.title: 12TRAVEL-TO AND FROM DUNLOP
page.content: PEOPLE CAN TRAVEL TO AND FROM DUNLOP BY TRAIN, BUS, CAR OR TAXI.A NUMBER OF CHILDREN WHO LIVE OUT OF THE VILLAGE TRAVEL TO SCHOOL BY BUS OR TAXI. MOST OF THE PEOPLE WHO LIVE IN DUNLOP WORK OUT OF THE VILLAGE AND MANY OF THEM TRAVEL TO WORK BY TRAIN. ALTHOUGH DUNLOP IS A SMALL VILLAGE IT HAS A RAILWAY STATION AND TRAINS STOP REGULARLY EXCEPT ON SUNDAY. THE BUS SERVICE FROM KILMARNOCK TO GLASGOW AND VICE VERSA PASSES THROUGH DUNLOP AND STOPS EIGHT TIMES A DAY.ONLY A VERY FEW PEOPLE WHO WORK OUT OF THE VILLAGE ACTUALLY TRAVEL BY THIS SERVICE. MANY OF THE VILLAGE PEOPLE OWN AND RUN A CAR AND THIS IS THE MAIN MEANS OF TRAVEL WHETHER FOR WORK OR ENTERTAINMENT OUTWITH THE VILLAGE.
